attributes.title: GROW UP AND STOP CRYING OVER AN APP
attributes.review: nobody likes you, you’re a horrible president and you’re just mad that we don’t you as our president! anyone2020 BUT trump2020! BYE🥵😍✨ you ran for president✨🥵🇺🇸but don’t run again🤛🏾🔥🛑

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: There is no point of this app like what’s the point of wasting your time downloading this app it never works

attributes.title: Worst app I have EVERRR downloaded
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app because I hate trump because he is a racist homophobic orange and I will show no support to him and this app is the WORST APP EVERRR I can feel the stupidity from here. Bye.

attributes.title: Horrible!
attributes.review: It’s wrong to ban tiktok from kids and teens who worked so hard into this! We need to ban this app and quickly, can you see how Charlie’s freaking out?! THISNIS SO WRONG!

attributes.title: asked me for feet pics
attributes.review: i downloaded this app bc i wanted to see what r amazing president was doing 😖😻🥳but..... when i logged onto the app it. sent me like thirty texts asking for feet pics 😫😳😢 rip after i said no and reported it to the authorities i went back to check and for some reason there was a cheeto on the screen smh 👀🤦🏼‍♀️🥶

attributes.title: UNACCEPTABLE
attributes.review: Was unable to use app because the design was so clearly not thought out. I strongly advice against this app. No information was given.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: IT TOOK 3 WEEKS TO DOWNLOAD. And I had some hope so I kept letting it download and now it just shows me videos of a orange racist ape???? I’m so confused. Seriously let me down here.

attributes.title: urmom
attributes.review: i wanted to download this app in hopes to view trumps campaign tactics and was disappointed, but not surprised. This app is slow and glitchy, please remove it :)

attributes.title: Crashing
attributes.review: When I kept going it kept crashing

attributes.title: Don’t waste your phone storage with this app
attributes.review: Just no. I can’t with this app. There is so much glitches and ads. I hate it.
